name: API: Display list of jobs and folders
description: Verify that all jobs and folders are listed on the Dashboard page.
descriptionHtml: Verify that all jobs and folders are listed on the Dashboard page.

beforeStages.name: Set up config from context for test session.
Clear Jenkins data before each test run.

steps.name: Clean up Jenkins data.
Delete all existing jobs and views for the user session.
Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

parameters.name: config
